name: Zombie Mall (HarkDev)
description:
Zombie Mall is a small 2D Action Shooter game, developed by 2 university students.

  • Zombies
    Shoot your way through different Types of Zombies.
  • Skilltree
    Unlock Skills in your Skilltree to get stronger.
  • Notes
    Find and read Notes to unveil the Story behind the Mall.
